name: PESTIL
description:
A MODERN HORSEMAN NEEDS A MODERN CONSOLE FOR SPREADING DISEASES. ACHIEVE YOUR INFECTION TARGETS BY PLANTING DISEASES WITHIN CITIES TO INITIATE THEIR TRANSMISSION. 9 LEVELS.

A SIMPLE MATHY PUZZLE GAME MADE DURING GLOBAL GAME JAM 2018 (THEME: TRANSMISSION)... MIGHT HAVE ISSUES...

VISUALS INSPIRED BY SEAN HEISLER.
